description: Angular packages for tRPC integration: HttpClient link and TanStack Angular Query adapter
rules: Use Angular 16+ and TypeScript 5.7+ for compatibility
Use @angular/common HttpClient for HTTP requests with angular-http-client
Use @tanstack/angular-query-experimental for reactive data fetching with tanstack-angular-query
Always inject HttpClient service when using angular-http-client
Create typed injectors with createTRPCInjectors for better ergonomics
Use Angular's dependency injection system with provideTRPC and provideTanStackQuery
Follow Angular best practices for component design and state management
Use Angular signals for reactive state management
Leverage Angular HTTP interceptors for cross-cutting concerns like authentication
